text: WOW air was a budget airline from Iceland. ==History== WOW air began in November 2011. Its first flight was on 1 June 2012. The airline flew 11 airplanes from the Airbus A320 family to destinations in Europe, North America and the Middle East. Wow air stopped operations on 28 March 2019. All flights were cancelled and thousands of stranded passengers were told to book with other airliners. ==References== Category:2011 establishments in Europe Category:2019 disestablishments in Europe Category:Low-cost airlines Category:Transport in Iceland Category:21st-century establishments in Iceland Category:Defunct airlines of Europe Category:Organizations based in Iceland
title: WOW air
